text: Bowling Green State University is a public university in Bowling Green, Ohio. The university has about 22,882 students. It was founded in 1910. The current president of the university is Dr. Carol A. Cartwright. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Falcons. They have 7 varsity teams for men and 10 for women, most of which compete in the Mid-American Conference. The men's ice hockey team plays in the Central Collegiate Hockey Association, which was re-formed starting with the 2021–22 season by several schools that left the Western Collegiate Hockey Association. Bowling Green had been a member of the first CCHA for that league's entire history (1971–2013). ==Other websites== *Bowling Green State University's Official website *Bowling Green Falcons' Official athletics website Category:Mid-American Conference Category:Central Collegiate Hockey Association Category:Western Collegiate Hockey Association Category:Colleges and universities in Ohio Category:1910 establishments in the United States Category:1910s establishments in Ohio
title: Bowling Green State University
